column1: The Purple Pig////This restaurant was very close to the hotel I was staying
column2: so I decided to check it out. I was not particularly hungry but still went because we were seated immediately on a busy night and shared the Milk Braised Berkshire Pork Shoulder. It was alright and fails to meet the expectations of all the reviews raving about this dish. Sure
column4: but it was nowhere near "melting" or "tender". There were rough patches and pieces that were particularly dry. For a signature dish
column5: I was really expecting much more
column6: especially considering the above average price point.
